description:
Data was generated from file metadata information from the GDC Release 21, December 2019. Current google cloud storage paths are mapped to file gdc ids.
More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#data-release-210

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this file (corresponds to the file_barcode)  ---  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba1
fields.name: file_gdc_id
